"About Solo Training: Worlds Beyond":
"In the Extreme Quest \"Solo Training: Worlds Beyond\", completion of Stage Orders affects the following Stage.

For example, stronger enemies and more virtual item drops may appear in the next Stage.

※This is the same as Extreme Training: Worlds Beyond."

"In the Extreme Quest \"Extreme Training: Worlds Beyond\", completion of Stage Orders affects the following Stage.

For example, stronger enemies and more virtual item drops may appear in the next Stage.

※This is the same as Solo Training: Worlds Beyond."
